meanings.sent1: The strong molluscicidal spray effectively eliminated the snails in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use molluscicidal chemicals to protect their crops from harmful snails.
meanings.sent3: The snails were so scared of the molluscicidal spray, they started wearing tiny helmets!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a molluscicidal force, wiping out any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The molluscicidal solution was as potent as a dragon's breath, swiftly eradicating the slimy invaders.

meanings.sent1: The farmer applied the molluscicidal to protect his lettuce from snails.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bottle of molluscicidal from the store to get rid of the garden pests.
meanings.sent3: The snails threw a party to celebrate the absence of molluscicidal in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The molluscicidal worked like magic, clearing the garden of unwanted slimy visitors.
meanings.sent5: The molluscicidal was the hero of the garden, saving the plants from destruction.
